title: SlamdunQ Golf
summary: Golf swing analysis & Automated Score card on Samsung Gear S2/fit2/Android Wear

descriptionHTML:
Note :- This app is no longer supported.

Turn your Samsung Gear S2, Gear Fit 2 or Android wear smartwatch into your very own Golf Buddy!

SlamdunQ Golf has been designed to be your golf buddy, be it on the course or the driving range.
Strap on your smartwatch, pair your SlamdunQ app on your phone and you are all set.
We will help keep your score card as you play your Game or help you perfect your swing on the Driving Range.

Gaming Mode (New Feature)

Using GPS technology and motion sensing, we now put the power of 30,000 golf courses right on your wrist.
- 30,000 golf courses across the world
- Yards, Par and HCP on your smartwatch
- GPS based detection of distance to green
- Motion-sending based stroke detection
- Auto scorecard generation

Driving Range Mode:
SlamdunQ golf helps you analyze your swing through bio-mechanics explained clearly via expertly designed parameters.

Sensors detect all the parameters a golf coach would advice for swing analysis and present the data in a concise and informative form on the phone. A state of the art animation shows you exact movement of your swing bringing to you, your very own ‘action replay’.


Supported devices:
1. Samsung gear S2
2. Samsung gear Fit2
2. LG-G and LG-Urbane watches
3. Sony Smartwatch 3
4. Asus ZenWatch
5. Huawei Watch
6. Moto360 2nd Gen
Tested with:
1. Moto 360 - sensors freeze a reset helps occasionally

Please read https://golf.slamdunq.in/SlamdunqGolf/resources/permissions.html to understand what permissions SlamdunQ Golf requires and why.
comments: I installed it but can't use it. The app tells me I need to register but every time I enter my details the app responds with "Error Message Invalid profile entry". Can anyone help me please? I just discovered this app and wanted to use it this morning but it doesn't seem like that is going to happen. I checked website for help or a FAQ but found neither. Very disappointed because it looked good.

Doesn't work Doesn't capture any data from my swing even though I have now used up all my games available and I can't even log a bug report (says preparing report and will notify me once ready but never notifies me)
Can't use the app without login and the sign up process is not working. The servers not responding error message. Wastage of time.
Utter garbage! Doesn't even let you log in. Can't register, just doesn't do anything. If you're going to release an app, top tip.... Make sure it works!

So much hope and potential is what I had for this app but as it goes with most of the free apps you can find it doesn't quite work I have a Samsung S7 and the Gear Fit 2 only will tell me I have improper swing did not get full action who knows
Used to work great, but like others have reported I can no longer login. No error message, just eventually times out.
recentChanges: A new mode to play a game in your favorite course and manage your scorecards.
